frontMatter.title: Redux Toolkit
frontMatter.summary: Redux Toolkit is a library that helps you write Redux logic more easily. It requires much less boilerplate code than the classic Redux library. In this post, I will show you how to use Redux Toolkit to write Redux logic.

next.title: Converting to TypeScript from React JS
next.summary: I recently started to convert my React JS project to TypeScript. I wanted to share my journey in converting my project and the steps I took to get started. Here I cover a few key concepts when you convert a React JS project to TypeScript.
